title: Trump Tariff Threat to Weigh Risk Sentiment, European Stocks
description: US President Donald Trump’s announcement of new tariffs on eight European countries over Greenland weighed on risk sentiment as trading kicked off on Monday, with the region’s equities facing the brunt of any selloff.
content: US President Donald Trump’s announcement of new tariffs on eight European countries over Greenland weighed on risk sentiment as trading kicked off on Monday, with the region’s equities facing the brunt of any selloff.
